articles.description: Honda has updated its CB series in the Indian market with the launch of the new CB350RS. The new model, which has been priced at Rs 1.96 lakh (ex-showroom), joins the H’Ness CB350 in the company’s India portfolio. The new model, similar to the H’Ness CB350, w…
articles.content:
- Priced at Rs 1.96 lakh (ex-showroom, India)
